annotation.TEXT: Yes there is! So there's the Yoshi coin I missed last time, which means I could've gotten them all even without Yoshi!
Ah, and with Yoshi, I can do P-switch recycling, so let's stomp and recycle it right here.
Ehh, it's safer if I go after this one with Mario's wall jump.
I wonder what I can use this P-switch for? Well, I'll take it with me for now.
Hey, why'd it go back to "200"? Did I catch on a wall just after the "400" hit? Probably.
Stupid piranha plant... BURN TO THE GROUND! WOO! BURN! BURN! BURN TO THE GROUND!

Well, I'm stumped... Wait, I don't remember seeing a midpoint in this level. You don't suppose I missed something during my science experiment that I thought landed me at the midpoint entrance, did I?
Huh. There's a suspicious-looking hole in the ceiling, but I have no way of getting up there. Oh, well.
In the back of my mind, something just doesn't feel right... Like I pulled off something that I wasn't meant to pull off...
Well, I noticed that with flutter jumping, but I didn't realize it was also true with wall jumping. Let me guess... This knowledge will be useful to me soon, right?
Oh, good. There's the goal. Now, is there anything of interest up this vine?
Oh, maybe this is meant to be a life-farming spot!
Yes, a flower replacement block!
Bye, Yoshi! I'm sorry!
Well, there's a springboard, but it's stuck right where it is. Also, there's a couple more of those blasted ! blocks that I'm getting sick of seeing...
Didn't look like anything was in that pit, but I had to check.
For science!
Oh, man. I really hope I don't run out of time after all that!
Ah, yep. It looks like I did indeed skip to the midpoint entrance last time, which cost me the Yoshi that I was supposed to have with me here!
Okay, these two green coin pits are completely safe to fall down. The leftmost pit looks like it requires wall jumps to get out of, and...
Well, let me deal with this bonus game first...
Whoa, fish! I'm surprised I didn't get hit there.
Argh! Stupid turn block bridges! BURN TO THE-- Wait, the bridges aren't flammable or inflammable. Fine, then I'll BURN the koopa that hit me! WOO!
Well, it sort of worked, but I just didn't do it very well...
Oh, man. I didn't realize there were blue coins that this vine can OMNOMNOM!
Hello, and welcome back to [title]! Today, I'll be exploring 2-1.
Hi, Yoshi! Umm... Sorry about my science experiment last time, but I really thought I was on to something for a moment there!
Aha! I found a key, which seemed particularly tricky to reach!
Hey, that parakoopa despawned on me, right when I was about to fry him good! Oh, well.
Nuts. Nothing.
They both have 8000. Next hit decides it!
Umm... It looks like I can go left or right here. I guess I'll go left first.
Gah! Why was that koopa in the springboard hole?! BURN TO THE GROUND! BURN! BURN TO THE GROUND! BURN TO THE GROUND! TRI-FORMATION!
Hey, stop catching on the wall and resetting my combo! ...Alright, I'm just gonna fast-forward until I reach the 1-up hit.
Huh. It looks like I'd need Yoshi to reach those blue coins below, but I just dumped him in a pit in order to make that huge jump... Maybe the game will give me another one?
Okay, that was just silly, but still, the upper ones are switching between plus and minus!
But first...
Alright, there's (the) midpoint, so that gives me a good general idea of where I am.
Oh, this pipe goes somewhere...
It totally looks like I'd need Yoshi to go under here...
Huh? This just leads over there, and all I get by going this way are those four coins. It doesn't seem worth the risk since I can just take the upper route.
Okay, let's go through this pipe this time!
And the winner is blue! Which means, I'm heading to 2-2 next!
And now what if I don't enter the pipe that led to the keyhole here?
May as well hit the P-switch too, but I'm not seeing anything special from it.

Alright, well it took me about twelve and a half minutes of video time to get here, but now it's time for me to figure out whether I go to 2-2 (the normal path) or 2-4 (the secret path) next. Let me bring up the voting results...
And I believe this is where I came out the first time. Wait... Is there no midpoint around here?
The 1-up under the goal is clearly meant for Yoshi, and I bet the pipe right there leads to the secret exit. (With this being a blue level, it should have a secret exit that doesn't unlock anything.)
Oh, I bet this is that coin trail I saw just after exiting that secret room last time, so I didn't really miss much.
Well, that's awesome! Now, let's go see what's over here... Well, there's another pipe...
Aha! I can wall jump up here! Bye, Yoshi!
Yeah, those center coins weren't solid blocks to begin with.
Going up!
And that looks like the arrow that's pointing towards midpoint (where I BURNED TO THE GROUND a fish last time). So, now I know exactly what that pipe skips.
Oh, yeah. There's this red ! block I had completely forgotten about. I guess now's a good time to show it.
Well, there's something over here, that's for sure.
It looks like I'll need this springboard to reach the fifth Yoshi coin, so I'm glad I could fry the fish!
End of the line, so I guess I gotta take this pipe.
Bye, Yoshi! Whoa, I actually landed somewhere! Maybe this leads to the secret exit?
There's the goal, and one more Yoshi coin down here, but I'm still missing a Yoshi coin... and a Yoshi for that matter. I'm definitely going to be replaying this level.
Nuts, missed a few.
Yeah, I saw that last coin hiding behind the turn block bridges.
Huh. It looks like I'm supposed to go up this pipe. However, the screen appears to keep scrolling to the right... Umm... I'm about to do something either really awesome or really stupid!
Man, I suck at whatever it is I'm trying to do with that multi-coin block there!
Ooh, a multi-coin block. I want to try something...
Okay, it doesn't look like any of them go anywhere. Oh, and while I'm here, and not about to time out, let's take a closer look at what's up this vine.
Well, I can go down here now (and miss a coin that I deem too risky to try for now).
Careful, I kind of want to hang onto Yoshi here!
Now, what if I don't fall down there for the key?
Huh? Neither of these pipes go anywhere? Oh, come on. Where's the secret exit then? I thought for sure it'd be here!
So, yep, let's go to 2-2! (What did you guys think of that "tiebreaker" level?)
Hmm... If I collect coins here in a particular way, then let the P-switch run out, will I find anything of interest by climbing up there?
I'm not seeing anything of interest up here. Well, let's move along...
It's an underground level, which I guess kind of maybe perhaps possibly makes sense.
Oops, I didn't get all the coins in time, but since I recycled the P-switch, that's not an issue!
Aha! I knew it!
Oh, hi, Yoshi! I take it this means you forgive me? Oh, but it looks like we might be doing another massive jump here... Are you ready, Yoshi?
BGM: Touhou 1 - The Positive and the Negative
That unlocks 2-4, but obviously, I'm not done with 2-1 yet!
Hi, Yoshi! I was wondering if I'd be seeing you in this level! Now I wonder if I'll need to maintain momentum while flutter jumping somewhere...
Argh! Stupid Rip Van Fish! I guess I'll use this reference now... BURN! BURN TO THE GROUND! BURN! TRI-FORMATION! WOO!
Oh, so that's the P-switch's purpose, to just provide bonus coins.
Oh, nice. Another red ! block. I can get my flower back here.
Come on, Mario. Don't start slipping up on me now.
Oh, I never tried wall jumping between the pipe and the wall here. Could that possibly be where the secret exit is?
Gotta check every pipe...
Unless there's an additional off screen platform, those blue coins are unreachable right now.
I'll let the vines OMNOMNOM some coins this time.
...I want to see if I can locate the Yoshi coin I missed in 1-2 earlier. I meant to check this last time, but forgot.
Okay, let's check every pipe...
Aha! Got 'em all that time!

Note: I miscounted the votes here. There was only 1 vote for an irregularly scheduled sandwich, but there were 2 votes for an irregularly scheduled sandvich with a "v". This doesn't affect the final result, though.
Also, I've been told that the blue ! blocks are just ordinary coin blocks, so I guess my earlier hunch about them perhaps being "star 2" blocks was wrong.
Yay! I didn't have to sacrifice Yoshi this time! But, all I get is a flower and a pipe leading up? You can't fool me this time! I know there's more to this area!
Huh. Well, there's a bunch of green coins, but I wonder why there are bullet cannons and what appears to be a bottomless pit down there?
So, where should I go next? 2-3, the blue level in the lower-left, or 2-4, the red level in the upper-right? Vote now, and we'll find out next time!
Okay, now this time, let's not walk into the wall!
Yeah, nothing but these four coins and a way to hit the goal tape near the top.
If this doesn't yield any results, I'm going to just scour the entire level off screen for a while.
Maybe not... Oh, wait. Did I just see something? Yep!
I have a sneaking suspicion that all of these blocks contain vines.
Well, this video's been going on for like forever, so I'm going to end it here.
Oh, by the way, this is how this song sounds with Addmusic 4.05, without those glitches that Addmusic K had.
...What? If none of these pipes go anywhere, then where do I go now? Oh, wait. I can just wall jump up here.
Ohh... I really want to check every pipe here, but I'm so short on time...
Sweet!
I saw a springboard down there. Is there anything else of interest down there?
Okay. One 1-up was all I wanted. Now I'm outta here. Huh... The camera doesn't properly scroll back up now. Well, whatever. That's not important.
Well, there's a small sloped ledge right there, but there doesn't appear to be a way to reach it...
Yeah, there's no reaching this 1-up without a P-switch.

Ooh, I saw that Yoshi coin up there! But, how do I reach it? Oh, I bet there's a vine in one of these blocks, likely in the lower row, so let's destroy as much of the upper row as I can first so the vine won't be blocked!
And now 2-3 is unlocked, but as I said, I'm redoing 2-2.
Nope. It just looks like a way to aim for a high number of stars. Alright, I'm outta here, and I'm taking the springboard with me for a bonus flower!
And up this easy-to-find vine, we find a flower and the first Yoshi coin.
Huh, what's with that coin trail? Maybe that's where I'd come from if I didn't enter that secret pipe, or maybe there's a springboard later on that I can use...
Whoa, that was weird!
Well, this gives me an excuse to go for that coin I missed!
Found a 1-up, but it looked like there was something further to the right...
Okay, there's two rows of turn blocks, and some of them contain stuff. Um... I think I should check the blocks in the upper row first, before destroying most of the lower row.
Oh, right. I can't approach those things I saw from the left, because of these darned gray ! blocks! Okay, now I do actually want to reenter this pipe over here now...
Whoa, careful! I did not come down here for the key. I fell by accident. But, at least I didn't screw up my wall jumping here!
Whoa, hello! Another pipe that goes somewhere! I'm so glad I'm checking them all!
I hope the time limit won't be an issue...
Whoa, hello there, pop-up 1-up! Also, I guess that actually is indeed Yoshi coin #2.

BGM: Stalking Down the Tiny Phantasmagoric Dark Shanghai Roads of a Missing Tomboyish Maiden with Black Eyes's Border Paradise Retour of the Eastern Heartfelt Lullaby of Past and Present Mystic Doll Judgement in the Sixtieth Year at the End of Spring
Oh, wait. Yoshi can't wall jump, so he can't get enough height to go this way (unless maybe I shell jumped). Okay, so the lower is to allow Yoshi to get over there.
Whoa! Watch it, piranha plant! I'm taking off here!

...the rightmost pit has the keyhole! Awesome! I was getting a little worried about the time limit here, but I guess I have more than enough time to get the blue coins on the left before triggering the secret exit.
Yeah, I wanted to try to avoid letting the vines OMNOMNOM any coins!
...there's no additional Yoshi. Oh, man... I didn't by chance manage to skip all the way to where the midpoint entrance would be by making that huge jump before, did I?
Turn block bridge formations: The Positive and the Negative!
Anything down here? You never know, and this hack's wall jumping is so handy for checking many pits!
To be continued...
I come out in the same spot. Alright, I kind of expected that.
Well, this is as far left as I can go, but...
Oh, and now I should be able to get these blue coins no problem.
Say, there isn't anything between these pipes, is there?
Now I wonder where I am in the level, and where the keyhole might be...
Whoa, hello! I found a secret pipe totally by accident!
Okay, now to slip under this here goal point...
So, which shell will get the eight hits needed to win first? That entirely depends on the random bounces of these footballs!
Crap, too low! ...Wait, what? How did I do that?! Oh, wow... I must've caught on the pipe, which allowed Yoshi to flutter jump again immediately, resulting in an epic recovery!
And that unlocks 2-2, but my OCD really wants me to check every pipe at the end of 2-1...
At least I could reach those coins with a well-aimed normal jump.
Yep.
Alright, now let's get back here and do 2-1.
Well, there was the third Yoshi coin, along with a mushroom, and I see some stuff below that I guess I have to approach from the left...
Alright, I've hit every block here.
Now, I probably would've found this secret exit eventually, but I feel like I got lucky to find it on my first run through the level!
Umm... Mario, you can move any day now. (Did he fall asleep while I was figuring out which level to go to next?)
Alright, so here's how this tiebreaker will work: The blue shell on the left represents 2-2, and the red shell on the right is 2-4. Whichever shell scores a 1-up first will win!
And, what if I don't go down the pipe here?
I guess I'll hit midpoint again for the heck of it.
Oh, yeah. I've got a loose springboard now, so I guess I can check out that hole in the ceiling that I saw earlier!
Hi, Yoshi! I apologize in advance for what I'm about to do...
Man, I've gotta say, this hack has some really well-hidden secret exits!
Ooh, mushroom platforms.
Can I make this jump?
It contains a flower. Now I wonder... Will red ! blocks always give flowers regardless of your status, or will they give you a mushroom if you're small? Maybe I'll find out later.
And now I'm going to go back into 2-2 and do that science experiment one more time...
Whoa, careful.
Wah! Yeah, Yoshi and turn block bridges can interact weirdly.
Well, now let's do this level the intended way!

...What. You're kidding. The Yoshi coin I missed was right here all this time? (*Checks earlier video*) ...Yep. This is indeed the one I missed, probably because I never scrolled the camera high enough to see it.
Say... I wonder if there's anything special under the goal here... I'll Start+Select if it looks like I'm falling to my doom.
There's a Yoshi coin, just handed right to me, but it might not actually be Yoshi coin #2... I wonder how much of the level I actually skipped...
And there's the secret exit! So I was on the right track the first time! I just didn't go far enough!
